description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nShattering Tackle:
Your creatures' attacks ignore 2.5% of the enemies' {STAT_defense} for each {RACE_Yeti} creature fighting on your side. This bonus is doubled if the enemy is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FROZEN}. This trait does not stack.
name: Special Snowball
